upper_left.name: Upper Left Quadrant
upper_left.hint: Pain or sensitivity here may relate to molars or sinus-related discomfort.

upper_right.name: Upper Right Quadrant
upper_right.hint: Cold sensitivity often links to enamel wear or early decay.

lower_left.name: Lower Left Quadrant
lower_left.hint: Swelling + fever suggests possible infection — seek urgent care.

lower_right.name: Lower Right Quadrant
lower_right.hint: Bleeding or tender gums may indicate early gum disease.
